Blacklist.label: Blacklist
Blacklist.tooltip: Comma separated list of users not to give currency to.

TwitchTierOne.label: Tier 1
TwitchTierOne.tooltip: Amount of currency given for a Tier 1/Prime sub.

TwitchTierTwo.label: Tier 2
TwitchTierTwo.tooltip: Amount of currency given for a Tier 2 sub.

TwitchTierThree.label: Tier 3
TwitchTierThree.tooltip: Amount of currency given for a Tier 3 sub.

TwitchSubMessage.label: Subscription message
TwitchSubMessage.tooltip: Notification when user subscribes. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with amount of currency

TwitchSubGifter.label: Gifter multiplier
TwitchSubGifter.tooltip: Percent of amount of currency for the gifter.

TwitchSubTarget.label: Giftee multiplier
TwitchSubTarget.tooltip: Percent of amount of currency for the giftee.

TwitchSubGiftMessage.value: {0} gifted {1} a subscription, adding {2} amount of currency for {0}
TwitchSubGiftMessage.label: Gift Subscription message
TwitchSubGiftMessage.tooltip: Notification for gifter when gifting subscriptions {0} is replaced with gifter, {1} for gifter, {2} with amount of currency

TwitchSubTargetMessage.value: {0} gifted {1} a subscription, adding {2} amount of currency for {1}
TwitchSubTargetMessage.label: Subscription target message
TwitchSubTargetMessage.tooltip: Notification for gifter when gifting subscriptions ({0} is replaced with gifter, {1} for giftee, {2} with amount of currency

TwitchBits.label: Bits percentage
TwitchBits.tooltip: amount of currency in percent of bits. Default 140% (100 bits $1.40 USD

TwitchBitsMessage.value: {0} cheered {1} bits, adding {2} amount of currency.
TwitchBitsMessage.label: Bits message
TwitchBitsMessage.tooltip: Notification when user donate bits. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with bits, {2} with amount of currency

TwitchAnonBits.value: Anonymous cheered {1} bits, adding {2} amount of currency to {0}
TwitchAnonBits.label: Anonymous bits
TwitchAnonBits.tooltip: Notification when anonymous donate bits. {0} is replaced with random user, {1} with bits, {2} with amount of currency

TwitchFollow.label: Follow
TwitchFollow.tooltip: Amount of currency given for a follow. Leave at zero to disable

TwitchFollowMessage.label: Follow message
TwitchFollowMessage.tooltip: Notification when someone follows. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with amount of currency

TwitchHost.label: Host
TwitchHost.tooltip: Amount of currency given per viewer for a host. Leave at zero to disable

TwitchHostMessage.value: {0} hosted with {1} viewers, adding {2} amount of currency
TwitchHostMessage.label: Host message
TwitchHostMessage.tooltip: Notification when someone hosts. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with number of viewers, {2} with amount of currency

TwitchChannelPoints.label: Channel points percentage
TwitchChannelPoints.tooltip: Percent of currency given for Channel Points. Set to zero to disable

TwitchChannelPointsMessage.value: {0} redeemed {1} channel points, adding {2} amount of currency
TwitchChannelPointsMessage.label: Host message
TwitchChannelPointsMessage.tooltip: Notification when someone redeems channel points. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with channel points, {2} with amount of currency

StreamlabsDonation.label: Donation multiplier
StreamlabsDonation.tooltip: Multiplies donation cents with amount of currency.

StreamlabsDonationMessage.label: Donation message
StreamlabsDonationMessage.tooltip: Notification when someone donates. {0} is replaced with user, {1} with value, {2} with currency, {3} with amount of currency
